name: Midnight Snack (Bruno Bricchi)
description:
Average playtime: 5-10 minutes.

CAUTION: The game contains loud sounds.

You're a 12 year girl who was left alone in house by your mom, but then, some strange things start happening... 

Controls:

WWalk ForwardAWalk to the leftSWalk backwardsDWalk to the rightEInteractL-Shift + WRunLeft Mouse ClickExtra interaction
